articles.title: Gold, Silver Hold Losses as Stocks Take a Breather: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Gold and silver extended their plunge from record highs, while Asian stocks slid after a rally on Wall Street showed signs of fatigue.

articles.title: Gold and Silver Stabilize After Massive Drops as Rally Cools - Bloomberg
articles.description: Gold and silver wavered, after suffering their steepest selloffs in years on Tuesday as concern their dizzying rallies in recent weeks had left them overvalued.

articles.title: Inside The Surprise Brazilian Tax That Rattled Netflix Earnings - Deadline
articles.description: Netflix CFO stressed that there's no other tax like this in other countries where the streamer operates and it won't impact results going forward.

articles.title: Amazon Plans to Replace 600,000 Human Workers With Robots, Report Says - CNET
articles.description: The retail giant has used robots in its warehouses for years, but it appears that the company is ramping up in a big way.

articles.title: A United Airlines emergency landing likely caused by collision with a weather balloon - AP News
articles.description: A recent United Airlines emergency landing appears to have been the result of a collision with a weather balloon over Utah. Layers of the aircraft's windshield fractured during the flight last week. Windborne Systems says it started looking into the incident …

articles.title: Companies Are 'Sprinkling Protein Everywhere.' Here's What Coke Is Doinjg - Investopedia
articles.description: Coca-Cola is opening one of the largest dairy processing plants in the U.S. as consumers' hunger for protein ripples through the food and beverage industry.

articles.title: Walmart Pauses Job Offers to Candidates Needing H-1B Visas - Bloomberg
articles.description: Walmart Inc. has paused offers to candidates requiring H-1B visas, people familiar with the matter said, the latest example of how the Trump administration’s $100,000 visa fees are disrupting workforces.

articles.description: JPMorgan Chase unveiled its new 60-story headquarters in New York City on Monday. The building replaces the Union Carbide Building at 270 Park Avenue. It's one of the first major office towers constructed after the COVID-19 pandemic. The bank plans to house a…

articles.title: Swiss Watch Exports to the U.S. Plummeted 56% in September - Robb Report
articles.description: Swiss watch exports to the U.S. plummeted 55.6 percent in September, with the industry still reeling from the effects of Trump's 39 percent tariff.
